titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1600a
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1600a

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

div.tei:ab:

Text preserved in this squeeze:
1.Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān bin Shahr, the ruler of 2.the children of ʿAmm and ʾAwsān and Kaḥid 3.[...] has excavated and bored through and smoothed and paved 4.Barīm and Ḥarīb. And he has built and established the house 5.the king in Qalay, with the mobil[iza]tion of the Qatabānians and 6.By ʿAthtar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by Ḥaw[kam] 7.and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān and by Dhāt-
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān bin Shahr, the ruler of [Qatabān and all of] 2.the children of ʿAmm and ʾAwsān and Kaḥid [and Dahasum and Taba-] 3.nū has excavated and bored through and smoothed and paved the pa[ss of Mablaqat, that of] 4.Barīm and Ḥarīb. And he has built and established the house (i.e. temple) [of Waddum and ʾAthīrat and the pavilion of] 5.the king in Qalay, with the mobil[iza]tion of the Qatabānians and the [resources of Barīm and Harbat] 6.By ʿAthtar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by Ḥaw[kam and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim] 7.and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān and by Dhāt-[Raḥībān.]

Text preserved in this squeeze:
Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān bin Shahr, the ruler of
the children of ʿAmm and ʾAwsān and Kaḥid
... has excavated and bored through and smoothed and paved
Barīm and Ḥarīb. And he has built and established the house
the king in Qalay, with the mobilization of the Qatabānians and
By ʿAthtar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by Ḥawkam
and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān and by Dhāt-
Restored full text of the inscription:
Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān bin Shahr, the ruler of Qatabān and all of
the children of ʿAmm and ʾAwsān and Kaḥid and Dahasum and Taba-
nū has excavated and bored through and smoothed and paved the pass of Mablaqat, that of
Barīm and Ḥarīb. And he has built and established the house i.e. temple of Waddum and ʾAthīrat and the pavilion of
the king in Qalay, with the mobilization of the Qatabānians and the resources of Barīm and Harbat
By ʿAthtar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by Ḥawkam and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim
and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān and by Dhāt-Raḥībān.

Restored full text of the inscription:
Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān bin Shahr, the ruler of Qatabān and all of
the children of ʿAmm and ʾAwsān and Kaḥid and Dahasum and Taba-
nū has excavated and bored through and smoothed and paved the pass of Mablaqat, that of
Barīm and Ḥarīb. And he has built and established the house i.e. temple of Waddum and ʾAthīrat and the pavilion of
the king in Qalay, with the mobilization of the Qatabānians and the resources of Barīm and Harbat
By ʿAthtar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by Ḥawkam and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim
and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān and by Dhāt-Raḥībān.
